introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how AI Solutions Company collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect information you provide directly, information from your use of our services, and information from third-party sources.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information to provide services, communicate with you, improve our offerings, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it in limited circumstances as described in this policy.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have rights regarding your personal information, including access, correction, and deletion.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@ai-solutions.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: Services
services.content: We provide AI and software development services as described on our website.

user.title: User Responsibilities
user.content: You agree to use our services lawfully and in accordance with these terms.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content and services are protected by intellectual property laws.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We are committed to making our website accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.

standards.title: Accessibility Standards
standards.content: Our website aims to conform to WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility guidelines.

features.title: Accessibility Features
features.content: We implement various accessibility features including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and high contrast options.
